attributes.additional_details: Due to recent events and polls we can see that a substantial number of the British people have changed their opinion about who they want to action their views and needs. The House Of Commons is founded on the principle that it, to it's best ability, represents the ideology of the general public of the United Kingdom, and therefore to continue being a world-class democracy of the people, there should be a general snap election to represent the current views of the people of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Hold a snap election as it is probable that the British population have changed their political opinion since the last general election as we have faced many unprecedented struggles such as the COVID-19 Pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
